mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, notice_no, notice_title,notice_content, notice_writer, notice_date from notice) where rnum <= #{endRow} and rnum >= #{startRow}
select * from (select rownum rnum, notice_no, notice_title, notice_writer, notice_content, notice_date from (select * from notice order by notice_no desc)) where rnum>=1 and rnum<=4
mapper.update: update notice set notice_title=#{notice_title}, notice_content=#{notice_content} where notice_no=#{notice_no}
mapper.insert: insert into notice values((select max(notice_no)+1 from notice), #{notice_title}, #{notice_content}, 'gkffhqnd', sysdate)
